message.body: not good, but not like he is 7 for 100
is he afraid of the 3 pt line
i guess he knows he can't shoot them
somebody needs to get in the gym and practice
he can take MCW with him
how do u have a 2 guard that cant shoot
always thought of him as a shooter/scorer not a distrubutor
that i dont know hes a pg
well im not really following the nba like that
i mean he averaged almost 7 asssts in college
well then the 3pt shooting isnt a major issue is cause thats not his job
just surprised you would think he is a SG
never thought of him as a distributor
correct, that is why I said , it wasn't fair
if he had shot more then that is still bad
even MCW probably has a better %
though now that i think of it that was dumb of me to not know that cause we all know about calipari and his pgs
so you flexing your muscle a little in NCAA this year
clear path to the championship game
aren't you top 10 with just those 6?
I thought I was down at like 25
last i checked we were 2 spots from eachother
i got a tough stretch coming up
yeah man im just saying lol
think we will beat L'ville on Saturday?
i have no idea what team will show up
go figure the year we are really struggling a little bit we beat L'Ville home and away
is it just me or do we tend to have more questions towards the end of the season then the beginning?
I mean I think that is only fair considering the big east season is brutal
if i was an aopponent id play 2-3 or box in 1 against us all day long
I think we have had some pretty damn good seasons lately
personally I didn't think we were a top 5 team when we were up there
yeah we have, i just hold them to an unfair standard
i am not too surprised of this fall
you know I have been on the dislike MCW bandwaon from early on
but ur tough on pgs like im tough on big men
either way he has blown since big east play started
i guess the only good thing is that all our defencicies have been exposed
so now we can work on it before the tourney
we got 3 games before the tourney on the 12th, hopefully its enough time to figure our ish out
Triche is such a headcase man
just don't think he is a great shooter
he gets so down on himself
he takes himself out of the game
there are periods where u dont hear from him for like 10 minutes he jsut goes thru the motion
he has been converted from a PG
u can still dish and drive
I think he is a nice player
but then he cant pass the ball and cause turnovers
don't agreeon the lst two points completely
his barrelling to the rim always picking up a charge
dude hes always out of control when things arent going right for him
and that dude can do no good
I would kill for scoop on this team
ive learned to appreciate scoop watching triche and mcw this year
and i feel bad i didnt appreciate him last year
you do realize that triche is our best ball handler by far right?
i didnt understand how much he meant to that team
yes but thats not saying much
look I don't think triche is perfect
thats why i siad allu gotta do is pressure the guards and we r done
i think he should be better then whats hes shown
I think triche can handle pressure fine
I would want him to be
it amazes me how consistent CJ is
but I don't hold it against him because it isn't for lack of effort, he isn't like MCW who makes a turnover and then cries about it and doesn't get back on defnse
I have no patience for that BS
get your butt back on defense
btw MCW is averagine 12pts 6 assists 3 TOs in BE play
when triche cant score it affects his whole game, he starts pressing and forcing things offensively
maybe i shouldnt say whole game cause he is fairly reliable on defense but hes prone to make more mistakes when hes havigna bad shooting day
i would agree, but he is kind of forced to press
triche is a nice completmentary piece
he is not a go to player
but I dont hold that against him
i dont think that is in his makeup
id strangle him with it if i could
first of all it starts with shoplifing
hes been pissing me off too
you at the starting PG on a top 5 team
and if you are my PG you are held to a diferent standard
just as a QB would be
just brings into question his maturity and deiciosn making
and then I see him pout during game
after bad plays instead of getting back
you compare everyone to all stars
i compare everyone to compentant players
HOW CAN U NOT CATCH THE BALL
if we have no competent players how are we 10-5 in the big east
what is this is third year
i kill Rak too, dude cant grab a rebound
all i know is if they were playing for MSU that crap wouldnt fly
i love the way izzos teams rebound the ball
rak is headcase too, he plays himself out of the game way too much
look at grant, he doesnt have that problem
even triche rebounds the ball better then those two for a guy his size
see for me effort is a lot
if a dude is giving max effort and can fill some need I can give him a lot of credit
BMK is getting hte most out of his ability
effrot without results is just wasted energy
he smart enough to enderstand how to play defense very well
he is our second best rebounder per min played
theres no excuse why he cant rebound or catch the ball
as a team we may rebound well but thats becuase of our 2-3 zone
we force teams to put up bad shots
dont get me started on rebounding
u know thats my first love
I think CJ is a solid rebounder
Kieta is actually our best rebonder per min
kid falls down atleast twice a game
just like u were quick to kill john wall over his 3 pt shooting
yeah because he took 17 total shots
Keita is playing 15 minutes a game for 25 games
there is plenty to draw on
sometimes your distain for a player clouds your judgement
he played 22 min against marquette and had 8 rebonds
i wont deny nor confirm that
he had 33% of our team's rebounds
hes suppose to grab them all
I like Grant by the way
not sure what you are proving
I think Keita is a serviceable backup center for our team
so if any of our big men gets those min that cj does then they would reboudn more
problem is we don't have a starting center
problem is we play 4 on 5 on offense
no matter who our center is
yeah, we don't have a starting center
they should put grant at center
you can afford to do that in stretches
yeah I would love to see Grant in the game any way possible
although Gtown was probably his worst game thus far
we have no low post threat
i dont need an all star center
if DeJaun can get in shape
we wont even throw the ball in the low block dude
and have Grant and CJ on the wings
yeah esp with the recruits we got coming in
no recruit will push him out of playing tie
i really do think jb has a history of nudging guys out the door hahaha
like hey u should think about going pro
we got like what 6 kids coming in and only 2 seniors
im telling u i think this is CJs last year
dont get me wrong i want him to stay
but it wouldnt surprise me if he left
because anyone leaving is not surprising
but you are nuts for suggesting that JB would nudge him out
i base that off of devendorf leaving so early i cant believe that happened
you would compare CJ and Devo?
no im not comparing them at all
Devo was a piece of WT that wad a decent college scorer
i jsut dont see how it works bringing 5 kids when u got only 2 players leaving
and we only have 8 scholly players
so that seems good to me
i count 7 returning if cj stays
actually we haveto add one cause of hte transfer kid
i have cj, rak, dajuan, gbinije (transfer) cooney, grant, bmk
all these kids coming in are not instant starters
well tyler ennis will have to start at pg
gonna need a big jump from him
Cooney is better off the bench
if i remember correctly patterson cant shoot
hes like whats his face with johnny flynn
maybe that gbinje can play up top
hes been playign pg in practice i read
who was the kid from up north that was suppose to be the second coming?
yeah but it atleaset shows that he may be versitile
he played high school ball with flynnn
why can't I think of his name
he plays for the main lobsters
ok so our starting five from PG to C is
he looks lieka baller if im not mistaking him with chinoso
god i hope dajuan is in shape and figures out how to score
he needs to be our low post threat
he is so slow with the ball in his hands
he should be able to put in work down there
the game is too fast for him right now too
and he always brings the ball down to his waist
keep the ball up big man
and i think thats freshman yr stuff
hes so used to just overpowering over guys
got so much work to do
